description:
What a hot body this guy's got! Bruce had done a little bit of nude modeling for a photographer friend of mine. When it was suggested that he do a video, Bruce was little hesitant but finally agreed to come out for a shoot.
He's a really nice guy, but very shy. He seems kind of embarassed by the whole thing at first, but quickly gets a nice, big hard-on.
Bruce is currently a student studying biology. He told me that he's gay and that he has a boyfriend who's OK with him doing videos as long as it's just him!
title: Bruce
